name: Asylum Escape
description:
The Story is you are in a Mental Asylum visiting a friend when the Asylum you visit is not what you think it is. Instead they keep patients for testing and experimenting on them. Escape the Mental Asylum from testing and expose the truth.

Enjoy and follow me on twitter @_DarrenSweeney

This game was made in 24 hours for the Galway Game Jam #3 which one first place. You can see the video here : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1YkUr3XCSgk It was my first ever game jam and was a programmer for the team! :D
